item.title: On The Nature of Memories – The House of Small Cubes
item.description: Between my never ending binges on Netflix, I came across a very curious short film – The House of Small Cubes. It had a 97% match for me. Netflix had never let me down before with its recommendations (that is, indeed, how I discovered and binged BoJack Horseman before final exams – I wonder what that reveals about my current state of mind), so I decided to give it a try.
